fine_dining.name: Palazzo Petrucci
fine_dining.atmosphere: Elegant dining room with views of the Bay of Naples
fine_dining.booking_tips: Book 3-4 weeks in advance, request sea view table
fine_dining.local_tips: Chef Lino Scarallo is known for elevating traditional Neapolitan dishes with modern techniques

fine_dining.name: Il Comandante
signature_dishes: Spaghetti with Clams and Burnt Wheat
fine_dining.atmosphere: Sophisticated rooftop restaurant in the Romeo Hotel with panoramic views of Vesuvius
fine_dining.booking_tips: Reserve at least 1 month in advance, request window seating for harbor views
fine_dining.local_tips: The tasting menu featuring seafood is exceptional, especially with wine pairings

fine_dining.name: Veritas
fine_dining.atmosphere: Intimate, elegant dining room with modern design
fine_dining.booking_tips: Book 2 weeks in advance, ask for chef's special seasonal offerings
fine_dining.local_tips: Chef Gianluca D'Agostino sources ingredients from small local producers around Campania

fine_dining.name: George Restaurant
signature_dishes: Risotto with Piennolo Tomatoes and Prawns
fine_dining.atmosphere: Sophisticated terrace dining with stunning views of the Bay of Naples
fine_dining.booking_tips: Book 2-3 weeks in advance, specify terrace seating
fine_dining.location: Grand Hotel Parker's, Corso Vittorio Emanuele
fine_dining.local_tips: Time your reservation for sunset for spectacular views of the bay as the city lights turn on

fine_dining.name: Sud Ristorante
fine_dining.atmosphere: Contemporary space with warm lighting and elegant decor
fine_dining.booking_tips: Reserve 1-2 weeks ahead, mention any food preferences
fine_dining.local_tips: Their wine list features excellent selections from small Campanian vineyards

casual_dining.name: Da Michele
casual_dining.atmosphere: No-frills historic pizzeria with shared tables
casual_dining.booking_tips: No reservations; arrive by 11:30 AM or after 2:30 PM to avoid the longest lines
casual_dining.local_tips: Only serves two types of pizza; featured in 'Eat Pray Love'; cash only

casual_dining.name: Tandem
casual_dining.atmosphere: Cozy trattoria dedicated to Neapolitan slow-cooked ragù
casual_dining.booking_tips: Reserve a day or two ahead; Sunday lunch is especially popular
casual_dining.local_tips: Their ragù simmers for at least 6 hours; try the 'zuppa di ragù' for the full experience

casual_dining.name: Sorbillo
casual_dining.atmosphere: Bustling, energetic pizzeria with artisanal approach
casual_dining.booking_tips: No reservations; expect to wait 30-60 minutes during peak hours
casual_dining.local_tips: From a family of 21 pizza-making siblings; they offer creative toppings while respecting tradition

casual_dining.name: Trattoria da Nennella
casual_dining.atmosphere: Lively, theatrical trattoria with singing waiters and local character
casual_dining.local_tips: Famous for boisterous atmosphere and waiters who joke with guests; fixed menu changes daily

casual_dining.name: Starita
casual_dining.atmosphere: Historic pizzeria with traditional wood-fired oven
casual_dining.booking_tips: Book 1-2 days in advance, especially for weekends
casual_dining.local_tips: Famous for the montanara (fried then baked pizza); featured in the film 'L'Oro di Napoli'

casual_dining.name: La Chitarra
casual_dining.atmosphere: Warm, family-run trattoria with nautical decor
casual_dining.booking_tips: Book a day ahead, especially on weekends
casual_dining.local_tips: Fresh seafood delivered daily from local fishermen; ask about the daily specials

casual_dining.name: Antica Capri
casual_dining.atmosphere: Rustic seafood restaurant with maritime decor
casual_dining.booking_tips: Reservations recommended for dinner; lunch usually has availability
casual_dining.local_tips: Their seafood antipasto platter offers a taste of various local specialties

street_food.name: Antica Friggitoria Masardona
street_food.local_tips: Operating since 1945; their stuffed fried pizza is a classic Neapolitan street food

street_food.name: Di Matteo
street_food.local_tips: Bill Clinton ate here during the G7 summit; grab a folded pizza from the street window

street_food.name: Puosteri del Mare
street_food.local_tips: Eat fresh seafood while overlooking the bay; perfect for a quick lunch

street_food.name: Pastificio Vicidomini
street_food.local_tips: Perfect for a quick, filling lunch; their pasta is made fresh daily

street_food.name: Pasticceria Attanasio
street_food.local_tips: Often has a line for their sfogliatelle served warm from the oven; worth the wait

coffee_shops.name: Gran Caffè Gambrinus
coffee_shops.atmosphere: Historic, ornate café with Belle Époque interiors from 1860
coffee_shops.local_tips: Historic literary café where Oscar Wilde and Hemingway visited; stand at the bar for lower prices

coffee_shops.name: Caffè del Professore
coffee_shops.atmosphere: Busy, traditional café with locals and tourists
coffee_shops.local_tips: Famous for flavored coffees, especially the hazelnut variant

coffee_shops.name: Intra Moenia
coffee_shops.atmosphere: Literary café and bookstore with intellectual vibe
coffee_shops.local_tips: Located in Piazza Bellini, a gathering place for students and intellectuals

coffee_shops.name: Mexico
coffee_shops.local_tips: Where locals stop for a quick coffee; ask for a 'sospeso' to participate in the tradition of buying coffee for those who can't afford it

coffee_shops.name: Scaturchio
coffee_shops.atmosphere: Traditional pastry shop and café from 1905
coffee_shops.food_options: Wide selection of pastries and cakes
coffee_shops.local_tips: Famous for their 'ministeriale' chocolate medallions, a secret recipe since 1905

bars.name: L'Antiquario
bars.atmosphere: Intimate, speakeasy-style bar with vintage decor
bars.local_tips: Naples' premier craft cocktail destination; bartenders create custom drinks based on preferences

bars.name: Enoteca Belledonne
bars.atmosphere: Cozy wine bar with walls lined with bottles
bars.local_tips: Over 3,000 labels with focus on small local producers; knowledgeable staff provide excellent recommendations

bars.name: Barril
bars.atmosphere: Stylish rooftop terrace with stunning bay views
bars.local_tips: Book in advance for sunset; spectacular views of Castel dell'Ovo and the Bay of Naples

bars.name: Archivio Storico
signature_drinks: Bourbon-based Kingdom of the Two Sicilies
bars.atmosphere: Elegant bar in historic palace with original architecture
bars.local_tips: Set in a 16th-century palace with drinks inspired by Naples' history; ask about the stories behind each cocktail

bars.name: Cammarota Spritz
bars.atmosphere: Lively street corner bar with outdoor seating
bars.local_tips: Popular student hangout in the historic center; stand outside on the piazza like locals do

bars.name: Chandelier Bar
bars.atmosphere: Elegant rooftop bar at the Romeo Hotel
bars.local_tips: One of the most sophisticated bars in Naples with views of Vesuvius and the port

food_tours.name: Street Food Tour of Naples
food_tours.booking_tips: Book at least a week in advance; wear comfortable shoes for walking the narrow historic streets

food_tours.name: Naples Food History Tour
food_tours.booking_tips: Reserve 10-14 days ahead; tour explains how Naples' tumultuous history shaped its cuisine

food_tours.name: Vomero Market and Cooking Experience
highlights: Shopping at local market with chef
food_tours.booking_tips: Book early in high season (April-October); wear comfortable shoes for market visit

food_tours.name: Pizza and Pastry Crawl
food_tours.booking_tips: Come hungry; tour includes tastings at 6-8 different establishments

cooking_classes.name: Neapolitan Pizza Workshop
includes: All ingredients, instruction, meal with wine, and recipe
cooking_classes.booking_tips: Book 2 weeks ahead; hands-on class where you make your own pizza from scratch

cooking_classes.name: Campanian Seafood Masterclass
what_you_learn: Fish and seafood selection and preparation
includes: Market visit, all ingredients, full meal with wine, and recipes
cooking_classes.booking_tips: Reserve 2-3 weeks in advance; begins with fish market tour when possible

cooking_classes.name: Neapolitan Family Recipes
includes: Ingredients, instruction, meal with local wine, recipe booklet
cooking_classes.booking_tips: Classes held in family home for authentic experience; book 1-2 weeks ahead

markets.name: Mercato di Porta Nolana
highlights: Fresh seafood direct from local fishermen
markets.local_tips: Best seafood market in Naples; go early for the freshest selection and watch locals haggle

markets.name: Mercato della Pignasecca
highlights: The oldest street market in Naples
markets.local_tips: More authentic and less touristic than other markets; where local restaurants shop

markets.name: Mercato di Antignano
markets.local_tips: Located in the upscale Vomero district; excellent for prepared foods and local specialties

spring: Fave e Pecorino (Fava Beans with Sheep's Cheese)
autumn: Pasta con Funghi Porcini (Pasta with Porcini Mushrooms)
winter: Zeppole di San Giuseppe (Saint Joseph's Day Fritters)
